item.title: Updating the good old Homologene database
item.description: Homologene What is wrong with homologene? Updating homologene gene IDs Updating homologene gene symbols Bibliography Homologene I am the author of a small package called homologene. The package wraps the identically named homologene database released by NCBI. This database includes information about genes that are homologues/orthologues of each other. It is structured as a simple table. One can simply access it by doing library(readr) library(magrittr) library(dplyr) dir.
